nithiya kadakala palathe wasaya karana paththak nogath juriyakin, thama warada kumak dayi pahadili kara di, thaman waradakaru yayi kiyannawa dakinnatath, thaman wenuwen sakki dena ayawa dakinnatath, thamange paththa kiyannata sakkikaruwan aniwarya lesin rajaye sahayen laba gatha hakiyawath, esema thamange nidahasata nithignyayekuge sahaya labannata ayithiyak thibimath athulath ya.
